entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
